description:
Usopp uses Viola`s Clairvoyance to prepare his ammunition to take Sugar out! But the slightest hesitation now will spell disaster -- and the end of Luffy! Luckily for the Straw Hats, Usopp`s ammunition has been specially designed for this specific situation!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichigeki Hissatsu: Dressrosa o Sukuu Otoko
One Shot One Kill! The Man Who Will Save Dressrosa!
Un coup mortel. L`homme qui sauva Dressrosa
Мастерский выстрел! Человек, который спасет Дресс Роуз
ضربة بقتلة! الرّجل الّذي سيُنقذ دريسروزا!
一撃必殺 ドレスローザを救う男
